segments.text: The problem is about determining whether a given string of cells (made up of W, R, B) can be formed using the stamp operation. The stamp covers two adjacent cells and colors them as BR or RB. Each application of the stamp can overlap previous ones, but each use affects the two cells it's applied to.

segments.text: Importantly, every time the stamp is used on a pair of cells, it toggles their colors. So for example, if a cell was R and you stamp it again, it might become B depending on the stamp's orientation. The key observation here is that the problem can be broken down into checking each segment between W's.
